edu.thu.keg.mdap.dataset

Interface DataSet

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DataSetImpl

    public interface DataSet
    Author:
    Yuanchao Ma

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void closeResultSet()
      Close the ResultSet of this DataSet, if any.
      DataField[] getDataFields()
      Get an array of the fields contained in the dataset
      java.lang.String getName()
      Get the name (unique identifier) of the dataset, like a table name in SQL or HIVE.
      DataProvider getProvider()
      Get the provider of this DataSet
      java.lang.String getQueryStatement()
      get query statement for querying data in the dataset.
      java.sql.ResultSet getResultSet()
      Return a connected ResultSet containing the records of this dataset, if it is loadable.
      java.sql.ResultSet getResultSet(DataField[] fields)
      Return a connected JDBC ResultSet containing the records of this dataset, if it is loadable
      boolean isLoadable()
      Whether this dataset is small enough to be loaded into memory

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Get the name (unique identifier) of the dataset, like a table name in SQL or HIVE.
        Returns:
        the unique name.

      • getQueryStatement

        java.lang.String getQueryStatement()
        get query statement for querying data in the dataset. The statement would be executed against the data provider.
        Returns:
        A string representing the query statement

      • getResultSet

        java.sql.ResultSet getResultSet()
                                throws javax.naming.OperationNotSupportedException,
                                       DataProviderException
        Return a connected ResultSet containing the records of this dataset, if it is loadable.
        Returns:
        a JDBC ResultSet. The ResultSet is generated when the method is called for the first time.
        Throws:
        javax.naming.OperationNotSupportedException - when dataset is not loadable
        DataProviderException - when actual data of the DataSet does not exist on the DataProvider

      • getResultSet

        java.sql.ResultSet getResultSet(DataField[] fields)
                                throws javax.naming.OperationNotSupportedException,
                                       DataProviderException
        Return a connected JDBC ResultSet containing the records of this dataset, if it is loadable
        Returns:
        a JDBC ResultSet. The ResultSet is generated when the method is called for the first time.
        Throws:
        javax.naming.OperationNotSupportedException - when dataset is not loadable
        DataProviderException - when actual data of the DataSet does not exist on the DataProvider

      • getProvider

        DataProvider getProvider()
        Get the provider of this DataSet
        Returns:
        a DataProvider instance

      • isLoadable

        boolean isLoadable()
        Whether this dataset is small enough to be loaded into memory
        Returns:
        a boolean indicates whether this dataset is small enough to be loaded into memory

      • getDataFields

        DataField[] getDataFields()
        Get an array of the fields contained in the dataset
        Returns:
        an array containing all the fields in the schema

      • closeResultSet

        void closeResultSet()
                    throws DataProviderException
        Close the ResultSet of this DataSet, if any.
        Throws:
        SQLException
        DataProviderException
